hero.title: Frequently Asked Questions
hero.subtitle: Common questions and answers about TempMail temporary email service

items.question: What is a temporary email?
items.answer: A temporary email is a disposable email address used to receive emails without exposing your real email address. It's commonly used for website registration, downloading resources, or other scenarios requiring email verification.

items.question: Is TempMail free to use?
items.answer: Yes, TempMail is completely free. We don't charge any fees and there are no hidden costs.

items.question: How long can I use the email address?
items.answer: Each temporary email address is valid for 24 hours. After expiration, the email address will be deleted and cannot receive new emails.

items.question: Can I send emails?
items.answer: Currently, TempMail only supports receiving emails, not sending them. This is to prevent spam and abuse.

items.question: Is it safe to use temporary email?
items.answer: Yes, temporary email is very safe. We don't store your personal information, and all emails are automatically deleted after 24 hours. We use modern encryption technology to protect data transmission.

items.question: What if I don't receive verification emails?
items.answer: Please check if the email was sent to the spam folder, or try refreshing the page. If you still don't receive it, there might be a delay from the sender, please wait a few minutes.

items.question: Can I create custom email addresses?
items.answer: Currently, we provide randomly generated email addresses to ensure security and privacy. Custom addresses are not supported at this time.

items.question: Is there a limit on the number of emails I can receive?
items.answer: There's no limit on the number of emails you can receive within the 24-hour validity period. However, we reserve the right to implement reasonable limits to prevent abuse.

items.question: Are attachments supported?
items.answer: Yes, we support receiving emails with attachments. You can view and download attachments directly on the webpage, but please be cautious with files from unknown sources.

items.question: How can I contact support?
items.answer: If you encounter any issues or have questions, you can contact us through the contact page on our website. We'll respond as soon as possible.

help.title: Still have questions?
help.subtitle: If you can't find the answer you're looking for, feel free to contact us.
